reviewText:
This was a video which I used to watch as a documentary in the discovery channel when I was a young boy (Back in India). I had this encrypted in my heart and soul and today I was able to buy the entire set for my little son and daughter to be!.

The movie is so moving and touching, that you realize the wonders created by God and the perfect ecosystem that he has developed where everyone has a part to play. The narration by John Hurt is too good!

You will salute the creator and admire his great creations after watching this movie!!
